src.visualization.fadingexc module

src.visualization.fadingexc.fade(colors, blobs, imshape, N=5)[source]
src.visualization.fadingexc.linearinterpcolor(v, vminmax, colorminmax, reverse=False)[source]

convert number or array to RGB color given the colors at extremes of LinearSegmentedColormap

Parameters

  • v (number or ndarray with dimention 1, 2 or 3) – value to be converted to RGB color

  • vminmax (tuple) – (vmin,vmax) to normalize v

  • colorminmax (tuple) – (colormin,colormax) at extremes of LinearSegmentedColormap

Returns

rgb255 – converted value

Return type

same shape as v, dtype=np.uint8
